Key Match Events: Tarik Skubal allowed one run in eight innings and struck out eight to become the fourth Detroit left-hander with 200 strikeouts in a season
The Tigers took the lead with two runs in the second inning
Post-Match Reflections: A.J. Hinch praised Tarik Skubal's performance
Alex Cora acknowledged the Tigers' aggressive baserunning strategy
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was played on the 1984 World Series championship celebration night
Tyler Holton pitched the ninth for his sixth save
Others: Nick Pivetta allowed two runs on six hits and a walk in six innings
The Tigers moved within 1 1/2 games of Boston for fourth in the American League wild-card race
